credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, wool foundation
Technique: tent, cross, satin, eyelet and stem stitches on plain weave
description: In the center, a prayer with flowering sprays on either side; at the top, alphabets and verse; below scene with shepherd and shepherdess and animals on a lawn before a house.
name: Sampler
